dependencies: Python standard library only: http.server, socketserver, os (serve.py: /serve.py)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application (Python HTTP server) exposed on port 8080
Container registry: AWS ECR (referenced in README.md, values.yaml, and .github/workflows/ci-cd.yml)
Kubernetes cluster: AWS EKS (aws eks update-kubeconfig in .github/workflows/ci-cd.yml)
Kubernetes Service of type LoadBalancer (Helm template: echo-server/templates/service.yaml) implying a cloud load balancer
Kubernetes ConfigMap for index.html content (Helm template: echo-server/templates/_configmap.yaml; also created via kubectl in CI)
External third-party API call from browser: ipinfo.io JSONP (embedded in Helm values indexHtmlContent: echo-server/values.yaml)
